text: Na Sabunsabunar a Piyakambokhag so manga Sogo ko Miyaona an Ka: Na Miphantang Siran ko Kiyapakambokhaga Kiran, go so Kiyaringasa-a Kiran, taman ko Kiyapakatalingoma Kiran o tabang Ami: Ä¶a da-a Phakasambi ko manga Katharo o Allah. Na Sabunsabunar a adun a Miyakaoma Ruka ko manga Totholan ko manga Sogo
